jobs.title: UI Engineer
jobs.description: I was in the Logs team at LogicMonitor, which became a part of the company after a Swedish startup was acquired. I joined shortly after the acquisition so I was able to develop and grow the product from early on. One of the things I worked on was building a new micro frontend for the logs page. The Stockholm office was closed in 2023.

jobs.title: Front-end developer
jobs.description: Origo is one of the biggest tech companies in Iceland. In my time there I worked in two departments, Travel Solutions and Healthcare Solutions. I worked on a variety of projects, including the biggest car rental system in the country and Heilsuvera, the national health portal. I was also part of a small team that built a system to keep track of all COVID-19 samplings and vaccinations in the country.

jobs.title: Intern programmer
jobs.description: I worked as an intern for one summer at NextCode in the back-end team. Most of my time there was spent writing tests for existing code. NextCode has since changed its name to Genuity Science.

jobs.title: Layout designer
jobs.description: I designed the layout of the printed paper at Icelandic newspapers DV and Stundin. I think many of the same principles apply to printed and digital media, so this was a good foundation for me to build on.
